name: SwipeX - Endless Arcade
description:
SWIPE as quick as you can!

CHALLENGE yourself with the new SwipeXtreme mode!

COLLECT the points to become best in the world!

Tired of standard arcade casual games? Midpoly is here to provide you the fast-paced pure gameplay action you crave with SwipeX. Join the addiction with thousands around the world in the race of man vs. machine. Rack up the points and beat the clock.

Join the fastest game and start lighting up leaderboards across the world!

Download is less than 30MB
No internet connection needed to play!

SIMPLE INTERFACE
SwipeX is made for speed and fun. Runs on all mobile smartphones and tablets!

SOCIALLY CONNECTED
Challenge your friends on the leaderboards and invite your friends to prove who the fastest is!

This game may include "Interest Based Ads" (please see URL for more information) and may collect "Precise Location Data" ​(please see URL for more information)​

Midpoly, the Midpoly logo, SwipeX and Swipe have either registered trade marks or trade marks of Midpoly Holdings Co., Ltd. or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
